     <div id="aboutContent">
      <h1>
       About Albany County
      </h1>
      <div class="homeTxt">
       <p>
        From the Helderbergs to the shores of the mighty Hudson, Albany County is a unique blend of urban excitement and rural relaxation. It is the ideal place to live, work and raise a family. A trip through our 19 municipalities will impress you. Our villages, towns and cities are beautiful and they play host to the finest in food, lodging, shopping and entertainment. Whether you hike our trails, bike on our paths, visit our parks and museums or fish our streams and brooks, you will find it all here.
        <em>
         Our current background image (above) was taken at John Boyd Thacher State Park in Voorheesville.
        </em>
        <em>
         <a href="/About/photosubmission.aspx">
          Click here to submit a photo.
         </a>
        </em>
       </p>
       <hr style="clear: both;"/>
       <div style="color: #12827c; line-height: 140%; font-size: 0.9em; padding: 0px; margin: 0.5em 0em;">
        <span style="font-weight: bold;">
         A reminder about the new area code dialing procedure
        </span>
        : To make calls within the 518 or the new 838 area code, you need to dial the area code and phone number. Local calls within 518 or 838 areas do not require you to dial "1" before the number.
       </div>
       <hr style="clear: both;"/>
       <div style="clear: both; height: 0.75em;">
       </div>
       <div style="border: 4px double #000066; color: #000066; padding: 7px; line-height: 140%; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 0.9em; background-color: #deebfc;">
        <div style="width: 65%; float: left;">
         <strong style="font-family: georgia, times, serif; letter-spacing: 0.02em;">
          Healing Moments:
         </strong>
         <br/>
         County Executive Daniel P. McCoy's community conversation on issues involving race, diversity and community policing, to build trust and heal divisions.
        </div>
        <div style="width: 30%; float: right; font-size: 0.8em; margin-left: 1em; letter-spacing: 0.01em; font-family: verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; text-align: right;">
         Video Archives
         <br/>
         <a href="https://youtu.be/wxOAVtpy4qU" style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 95%;" target="_blank">
          August 22, 2017
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a href="https://youtu.be/9wz-nIyYRB4" style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 95%;" target="_blank">
          October 24, 2016
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a href="https://youtu.be/ts48KP4LaTs" style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 95%;" target="_blank">
          August 15, 2016
         </a>
        </div>
        <div style="clear: both;">
        </div>
       </div>
